sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import React from 'react' import './Main.css' import instagramLogo from '../assets/owner/instagram.png' import twitterLogo from '../assets/owner/twitter.png' import moreIcon from '../assets/owner/more.png' const Main = ({selectedPunk, punkListData}) => { const [activePunk, setActivePunk] = useState(punkListData[0]) useEffect(() => { setActivePunk(punkListData[selectedPunk]) }, [punkListData, selectedPunk]) return (
{activePunk.name}
#{activePunk.token_id}
{activePunk.price}
{activePunk.owner.address}
) } export default Main
